subject: Olympic Games
Amateur Athletics
Wrestling
lead_paragraph: Ben Askren made a quick transition from N.C.A.A. champion from Missouri to Olympian when he won the United States 163-pound freestyle trials, beating Tyrone Lewis in consecutive matches Sunday night in Las Vegas.
snippet: Ben Askren made a quick transition from N.C.A.A. champion from Missouri to Olympian when he won the United States 163-pound freestyle trials, beating Tyrone Lewis in consecutive matches Sunday night in Las Vegas.
